Package org.robolectric

Package containing main Robolectric classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ShadowsAdapter
    Interface between robolectric and shadows-core modules.
    ShadowsAdapter.ShadowActivityAdapter  
    ShadowsAdapter.ShadowApplicationAdapter  
    ShadowsAdapter.ShadowLooperAdapter  
    TestLifecycle<T>  
    TestLifecycleApplication  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTestLifecycle  
    MultiApiRobolectricTestRunner
    A test runner for Robolectric that will run a test against multiple API versions.
    MultiApiRobolectricTestRunner.TestRunnerForApiVersion  
    ParameterizedRobolectricTestRunner
    A Parameterized test runner for Robolectric.
    Robolectric  
    RobolectricGradleTestRunner
    Test runner customized for running unit tests either through the Gradle CLI or Android Studio.
    RobolectricTestRunner
    Installs a InstrumentingClassLoader and ResourceLoader in order to provide a simulation of the Android runtime environment.
    RoboSettings
    Class that encapsulates reading global configuration options from the Java system properties file.
    RuntimeEnvironment  
    TestLifecycleApplicationImpl  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ParameterizedRobolectricTestRunner.Parameters
    Annotation for a method which provides parameters to be injected into the test class constructor by Parameterized
